item.title: The blemishes in Broadcom’s earnings that are putting pressure on the chipmaker
item.description: Wall Street analysts ultimately stayed bullish on Broadcom, citing the semiconductor manufacturer's long-term AI momentum.

item.title: JPMorgan upgrades Citigroup as profitability improves
item.description: JPMorgan's new price target implies that shares of Citigroup could rise 11% from here.

item.title: TD Cowen raises Alphabet target on growing Gemini users and AI-powered Google searches
item.description: TD Cowen sees an artificial intelligence-driven rally ahead for Alphabet stock.

item.title: Citi says Boeing is a buy as the new year approaches. Here's why
item.description: The bank initiated the aerospace and defense stock with a buy rating.

item.title: Broadcom’s results are due after Thursday’s close — here's what top analysts are expecting
item.description: Analysts anticipate strong forecasts for sales of its custom ASICs chips, and more clarity on Broadcom's fourth "mystery" customer.
